title: Controls are on the fritz... (NO! NOT ALL THE ROCKETS!!)
body:
For some reason or another whenever I head into a game I sometimes get this issue when I'll be in the middle of the game only for my controls to switch like crazy! My Q becomes my W, my W becomes my E and on rare occasions it'll go into maximum overdrive and my Q will be my R. It's had some rather... interesting results. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
So far the only fix I've come up with is recalling, DCing and then quickly reconnecting.
I read a previous thread about a similar happening and the advice given was to delete the config file and reset... However it didn't seem to work.

It may just be a me issue however I thought it would be a good idea to bring this up. I'll give some details as to what specs I have for hardware so if it is a me issue I can look more into this.
 
My bindings in league are:
standard: Q W E R 
trinket: 4
Items: Z X C V MB5 MB4 

My specs are:
Keyboard: Logitech Orion Spark G910
Mouse: Logitech Probeus Spectrum G502

Thank you for your time.

replies.body:
It worked, everything is working smoothly because of that fix! Thanks for the assist!

 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Oh no, that's spooky!  This could happen if you're being haunted :P or your config is corrupt.  Resetting your config settings should fix this up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps!
